Package index

Main Interpretation Functions

Core functions for interpreting psychometric analysis results using LLMs.

interpret()
Interpret Psychometric Analysis Results
show_interpret_args()
Show Available Parameters for interpret()

Variable Labeling

Functions for generating concise, descriptive labels for variables based on their descriptions using LLMs. Supports various label formats and extensive post-processing options.

label_variables()
Generate Variable Labels Using LLM
reformat_labels()
Reformat Variable Labels
export_labels()
Export Variable Labels
create_variable_labels()
Create Variable Labels Object
format_label()
Format Label with Post-Processing
parse_label_response()
Parse Label Response from LLM
print(<variable_labels>)
Print Variable Labels Object

Chat Session Management

Functions for creating and managing persistent LLM chat sessions for token-efficient multi-analysis workflows. Chat sessions preserve system prompts across multiple interpretations, reducing API costs by 40-60%.

chat_session()
Create Analysis Chat Session
is.chat_session()
Check if object is a chat_session
reset.chat_session()
Reset chat session

Configuration Functions

Functions for creating configuration objects that control LLM parameters, model-specific settings, and output formatting.

llm_args()
Create LLM Configuration
interpretation_args()
Create Model-Specific Interpretation Configuration
interpretation_args_gm()
Create Interpretation Arguments for Gaussian Mixture Models
labeling_args()
Create Labeling Arguments Configuration
output_args()
Create Output Configuration
default_output_args()
Get Default Output Config

Parameter Registry & Validation

Functions for accessing and validating parameter configurations from the centralized registry.

PARAMETER_REGISTRY
Parameter Registry
get_param_default()
Get Parameter Default Value
get_params_by_group()
Get Parameters by Configuration Group
get_registry_param_names()
Get Registry Parameter Names
validate_param()
Validate Single Parameter
validate_params()
Validate Multiple Parameters

Visualization & Theming

Functions for creating visual representations and applying consistent styling.

plot(<fa_interpretation>)
Plot Factor Analysis Interpretation Results
plot(<gm_interpretation>)
Plot GM Interpretation
plot(<interpretation>)
Generic plot method for interpretation objects
create_factor_plot()
Create a visual representation of factor loadings
create_cluster_profile_plot()
Create Cluster Profile Plot
theme_psychinterpreter()
Custom ggplot2 Theme for psychinterpreter Visualizations
psychinterpreter_colors()
Get Color-Blind Friendly Palettes for psychinterpreter Visualizations

Export Functions

Export interpretation results to various formats.

export_interpretation()
Export Interpretation Report (S3 Generic)
export_interpretation(<fa_interpretation>)
Export Factor Analysis Interpretation Report
export_interpretation(<gm_interpretation>)
Export Gaussian Mixture Interpretation Report

Utility Functions

Helper functions for analyzing patterns and checking object types.

find_cross_loadings()
Find Cross-Loading Variables
find_no_loadings()
Find Variables with No Loadings Above Cutoff
find_overlapping_clusters()
Find Overlapping Clusters
find_distinguishing_variables_gm()
Find Distinguishing Variables for Clusters
is.interpretation()
Check if object is an interpretation

Print Methods

S3 methods for displaying interpretation results, chat sessions, and configuration objects.

print(<fa_interpretation>)
Print Factor Analysis Interpretation Results
print(<gm_interpretation>)
Print Method for GM Interpretation Objects
print(<interpretation>)
Generic print method for interpretation objects
print(<chat_session>)
Print method for chat_session objects
print(<llm_args>)
Print method for llm_args
print(<interpretation_args>)
Print method for interpretation_args
print(<labeling_args>)
Print Labeling Arguments
print(<output_args>)
Print method for output_args

Internal S3 Generics

Internal S3 generic functions for extending the package with new model types. These functions are exported for developers implementing new model classes but are not intended for end users.

build_analysis_data()
Build Analysis Data (S3 Generic)
build_system_prompt()
Build System Prompt (S3 Generic)
build_main_prompt()
Build User Prompt (S3 Generic)
build_report()
Build Report (S3 Generic)
build_structured_list()
Build Structured List for Interpretation
create_default_result()
Create Default Result (S3 Generic)
create_fit_summary()
Create Fit Summary (S3 Generic)
extract_by_pattern()
Extract by Pattern (S3 Generic)
extract_model_parameters()
Extract Model-Specific Parameters from Config Objects
validate_parsed_result()
Validate Parsed Result (S3 Generic)
validate_list_structure()
Validate and Extract Structured List Components (S3 Generic)
validate_model_requirements()
Validate Model-Specific Requirements
interpret_model()
Internal S3 Generic for Interpreting Fitted Model Objects
abbreviate_word()
Abbreviate Word Using Rules
